title: Aaron Rodgers claims Bears ownership, Ravens blast Chargers, Cardinals still undefeated, Game Balls and MNF Preview
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers claims Bears ownership, Ravens blast Chargers, Cardinals still undefeated, Game Balls and MNF Preview
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Cris Carter explore an impressive win for the Cardinals over the Browns. Aaron Rodgers and the Packers get an emotional win over the Bears but Kyle has a conspiracy theory about the motivation. The Cowboys pull out a back and forth finish against the Patriots. Before a MNF preview, we hand out Week 6 Game Balls including QB Kirk Cousins, who has led the Vikings to three wins in four games.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
